I was wondering if the subscribers of this group could answer a 
question r=
egarding the composition of samurai armies circa 1582-1600.

We are a group=
 of wargamers interested in Japanese Samurai history & 
battles. We want to=
 know the actual involvment of peseants/baggage 
handlers porters etc that =
accompanied the samurai in battles of this 
period. We have two trains of t=
hought that these were enrolled in the 
armies and fought along with the as=
higaru units.  The other that they 
were a non combative role and remained =
in the rear even though 
technically they may have been armed with some wea=
pons etc.

Any ideas or responses would be appreciated.
